languages.text: Капитан "Неуловимого презрения" выходит на связь. В его голосе звенит надменная усмешка — кажется, игру в догонялки пора заканчивать, и Шелби не сомневается, что выйдет из нее победителем. А уж после смерти Вольного Торговца он вдоволь повеселится на богатых просторах протектората фон Валанциус, прежде чем кто-то вновь решит объявить на него охоту. С мостика докладывают: "Презрение" готовит орудия к бою!

traits.locale_text: Капитан "Неуловимого презрения" выходит на связь. В его голосе звенит надменная усмешка — кажется, игру в догонялки пора заканчивать, и Шелби не сомневается, что выйдет из нее победителем. А уж после смерти Вольного Торговца он вдоволь повеселится на богатых просторах протектората фон Валанциус, прежде чем кто-то вновь решит объявить на него охоту. С мостика докладывают: "Презрение" готовит орудия к бою!

languages.text: The Elusive Contempt's captain contacts you. You can hear notes of disdain and mockery in his voice — playtime is over, and he's sure he's going to come out on top. After the Rogue Trader's death, the von Valancius protectorate will become his playground, where he'll claim plenty of booty before someone dares hunt him again. The bridge officers report: the Elusive Contempt is preparing for battle!
languages.original_text: Капитан "Неуловимого презрения" выходит на связь. traits.locale_text: The Elusive Contempt's captain contacts you. You can hear notes of disdain and mockery in his voice — playtime is over, and he's sure he's going to come up on top. After the Rogue Trader's death, the von Valancius protectorate will become his playground, where he'll claim plenty of bounty before someone dares hunting him again. The bridge officers report: the Elusive Contempt is preparing for battle!

languages.text: 诡秘蔑视的舰长联系了你，他的声音里满是轻蔑与嘲弄之意。游戏时间结束了，他确信这场战斗的赢家会是他。等到行商浪人死了之后，冯·瓦兰修斯王朝就会成为他的游乐场，他会在那里大肆劫掠，直到再次有人胆敢追捕他为止。舰桥上的军官报告，说诡秘蔑视号正在做战斗准备！
languages.original_text: The Elusive Contempt's captain contacts you. You can hear notes of disdain and mockery in his voice — playtime is over, and he's sure he's going to come out on top. After the Rogue Trader's death, the von Valancius protectorate will become his playground, where he'll claim plenty of booty before someone dares hunt him again. The bridge officers report: the Elusive Contempt is preparing for battle!

languages.text: エルーシブ・コントンプト号の船長から連絡が来る。彼の声には軽蔑と嘲笑が感じられる。遊びの時間は終わりだ。彼は頂点に立てると確信している。自由開拓者が死ねば、フォン・ヴァランシウス保護国家は彼の遊び場となり、彼の命を狙う勇気ある者が再び現れる前に、報奨金をたっぷり手にすることになるだろう。ブリッジの士官の報告によると、エルーシブ・コントンプト号は戦闘準備を整えている！
languages.original_text: The Elusive Contempt's captain contacts you. You can hear notes of disdain and mockery in his voice — playtime is over, and he's sure he's going to come out on top. After the Rogue Trader's death, the von Valancius protectorate will become his playground, where he'll claim plenty of booty before someone dares hunt him again. The bridge officers report: the Elusive Contempt is preparing for battle!

languages.text: El capitán del Odio Escurridizo se pone en contacto contigo. Puedes oír en su voz desdén y burla. El juego ha terminado, y confía plenamente en su victoria. Tras la muerte {mf|del|de la} Comerciante Independiente, el protectorado von Valancius estará a su merced y aprovechará para cobrarse numerosas presas antes de que alguien vuelva a osar desafiarle. Los oficiales del puente informan: ¡el Odio Escurridizo se prepara para la batalla!
languages.original_text: The Elusive Contempt's captain contacts you. You can hear notes of disdain and mockery in his voice — playtime is over, and he's sure he's going to come out on top. After the Rogue Trader's death, the von Valancius protectorate will become his playground, where he'll claim plenty of booty before someone dares hunt him again. traits.locale_text: El capitán del Odio Escurridizo se pone en contacto contigo. Puedes oír en su voz desdén y burla. El juego ha terminado, y confía plenamente en su victoria. Tras la muerte {mf|del|de la} Comerciante Independiente, el protectorado von Valancius estará a su merced y aprovechará para cobrarse numerosas presas antes de que alguien vuelva a osar desafiarle. Los oficiales del puente informan: ¡el Odio Escurridizo se prepara para la batalla!

languages.text: Der Captain der Flüchtigen Verachtung kontaktiert dich. Du hörst Untertöne von Verachtung und Spott in seiner Stimme. Es ist Schluss mit lustig, und er will dafür sorgen, dass er am Ende die Oberhand hat. Nach dem Tod {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} wird das Protektorat von Valancius zu seinem Spielplatz werden und er wird sich reichlich Beute krallen, ehe es das nächste Mal jemand wagt, ihn zu jagen. Die Offiziere auf der Brücke melden: Die Flüchtige Verachtung rüstet sich zum Gefecht!
languages.original_text: The Elusive Contempt's captain contacts you. You can hear notes of disdain and mockery in his voice — playtime is over, and he's sure he's going to come out on top. Die Offiziere auf der Brücke melden: Die Flüchtige Verachtung rüstet sich zum Gefecht!

languages.text: Le capitaine de l'Insaisissable Avanie vous contacte. Sa voix est empreinte de dédain et de moquerie ; la partie touche à sa fin et il est sûr de l'emporter. Une fois {mf|le libre-marchand éliminé|la libre-marchande éliminée}, le protectorat von Valancius deviendra son terrain de jeu, et il raflera des tonnes de butin avant que quelqu'un d'autre ose le prendre en chasse. Les officiers de la passerelle vous informent que le vaisseau pirate s'apprête à attaquer !
languages.original_text: The Elusive Contempt's captain contacts you. You can hear notes of disdain and mockery in his voice — playtime is over, and he's sure he's going to come out on top. languages.text: Kaçkın Kibir'in kaptanı seninle iletişime geçiyor. Sesinde küçümseme ve alay notaları duyuyorsun. Oyun zamanı bitti, galip geleceğinden emin. Hür Tacir'in ölümünden sonra von Valancius protektorasını oyun sahasına çevirecek ve yeniden birisi onu avlamaya cesaret edene dek bolca ganimet elde edecek. Köprü subayları, Kaçkın Kibir'in savaşa hazırlandığını rapor ediyor!
